version_description: Thanks to popular demand, Version 2.0 now lets you quit the app and lock your screen at night. Your phone needs to sleep too!

Thanks for using Alarm Clock for Spotify! What's new:

1. Introducing Playlists - You can now create a Playlist and wake up to a random song from that Playlist every morning!
2. You can now have the song loop forever - I got rid of the 30 second limit.
3. Added a Support Page

This update also includes several major bug fixes. Thank you to everyone who emailed me for support and contributed to the improvements.

Thanks for supporting Music Alarm Clock!

I've been listening to your bug fixes and suggestions, and this version fixes all of the known bugs. The worst bug was causing playlists with 4 songs to repeatedly crash the app every time you opened it.

To report more bugs or suggest performance improvements, please email me at iam@willsaid.com and check out the support page at willsaid.com/spotify

Thanks for updating Music Alarm Clock Pro for Spotify!
Turn on automatic updates to ensure you're using the app with the best quality, with bug fixes and performance improvements.

Thanks for updating Music Alarm Clock Pro for Spotify!
This version fixes an issue for supporting Light/Dark Mode when searching for a song.
